Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Restructure docs folder and add scoring model with Punti Elmetto system

- Reorganize docs/ into numbered folders \(02_ARCHITETTURA, 03_MODULI, 07_ANALISI\)
- Move existing docs into correct folders \(wireframes, specs, proposals\)
- Add SCORING_MODEL.md: complete behavioral scoring with 2 channels, 12 actions,
  worker category matrix, anti-abuse rules, and data impact estimates
- Add BUSINESS_PROPOSAL_V2.md: new universal platform model with ecommerce,
  dual wallet system \(Punti Elmetto + Punti Welfare\), welfare plans S/M/L
- Introduce "Punti Elmetto" branding for engagement points across both docs
- Add marketplace UX card wireframes \(4 scenarios\) with checkout flows
- Update CLAUDE.md with app architecture details

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add ecommerce model document with dropshipping, BNPL and dual wallet checkout

Define complete ecommerce architecture: 100% dropshipping, fixed 30% markup,
6 product categories \(home, clothing, tech, consumables, sport, vouchers\),
Punti Elmetto \(max 20% discount\) + Punti Welfare \(up to 100% redemption\),
BNPL via Scalapay/Klarna with interest paid by customer, shipping always
paid by worker, 4-phase rollout from digital vouchers to full catalog.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add promotions and discounts section to ecommerce model

Define promotion rules: 30% markup always on actual supplier cost,
supplier discounts pass through to public price while margin stays 30%.
Add 6 promotion types \(supplier discount, weekly product, flash sale,
seasonal theme, double points, first purchase bonus\) with rules and
worked example showing cumulative supplier + Punti Elmetto discounts.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
